name: Space Saga demo
description:
Hey guys,

This is my first project. would love to get constructive feedback.

i finally got to a stage that it has a beginning, core game loop and an ending.

I know it's not perfect, I'm aware  of some bugs and other issues,

but I really wanna hear your honest opinion, 

What did you like about it

What didn't you like about it.

I'm thinking to where should I take it from here

and will appreciate your time playing and replying.

p.s  - having problems loading the full game with scenes at the moment.

Core game loop only works on webgl.

Full demo available for download.

including 2 story parts

tutorial

cut scene drawings

best,

Yak.
